SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO =? AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR CATEGORY_NM LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM <= ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO =? AND AREA_CATEGORY_CD = ? AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR CATEGORY_NM LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM <= ?
